name: Apple and Pears
description: Apple and Pears is a leading FMCG manufacturer known for its quality products like Laziz oil and chocolate drinks.
positioningStatement: Leading FMCG manufacturer of oils and chocolate beverages

name: BUA Foods
description: BUA Foods is a major player in the Nigerian food industry, offering essential products like IRS flour and pasta.
positioningStatement: Major Nigerian food player with flour, pasta, and sugar products

name: Crown Flour Mills
description: A subsidiary of Olam, Crown Flour Mills is a top producer of wheat-based products including Mamagold.
positioningStatement: Olam subsidiary specializing in wheat-based baking products

name: Dangote
description: Dangote Group is one of Nigeria's most diversified business conglomerates, renowned for its excellent business practices and quality sugar.
positioningStatement: Nigeria's most diversified business conglomerate with a strong presence in sugar.

name: Multipro
description: Multipro Consumer Products Limited is a leading distributor for top brands like Indomie, Dano, Power Oil, and Minimie.
positioningStatement: Leading distributor for top brands like Indomie, Dano, Power Oil, and Minimie.

name: PZ Wilmar
description: PZ Wilmar is a joint venture producing and refining top edible oil brands like Kings and Mamador.
positioningStatement: Joint venture producing premium edible oils and seasonings

name: SNF Foods
description: SNF Foods Limited is a manufacturer of quality food products, including Activa cooking oils and Whippy mayonnaise.
positioningStatement: Manufacturer of quality food products, including Activa cooking oils and Whippy mayonnaise.

name: Sonia Foods
description: Sonia Foods Industries Limited is a leading manufacturer of tomato paste and seasonings in Nigeria.
positioningStatement: Leading manufacturer of tomato paste and seasonings in Nigeria.

name: TGI
description: Tropical General Investments (TGI) Group is a global conglomerate that owns the popular Terra brand of seasoning and oil.
positioningStatement: Global conglomerate with Terra brand seasoning and oil solutions

name: Flour Mills of Nigeria
description: A leader in the Nigerian food industry and owner of iconic brands like Golden Penny, Honeywell, and Auntie B.

name: Vital Products
description: Vital Products PLC is a manufacturer of fruit juices, drinks, and sauces, including Vitali Margarine and Laziz Chocolate Drink.
positioningStatement: Manufacturer of fruit juices, drinks, and sauces.
